tag_list: tioti, ipi, ceo, entrepeneur, seattle, founder, co-founder, university-of-michigan, twice, funded
overview:
Marc Colando is a twice-funded Seattle entrepreneur currently based in Seattle.

Marc most recently co-founded TIOTI, a social media aggregator for TV. Before TIOTI, Marc was founder and President/CEO if Interactive Planet, Inc. IPI was a Web 1.0 leader, architecting and designing many well-known Web sites for clients like Bank of America, The Coca-Cola Company, The US Marine Corps, Kodak and EarthLink.

Websites, apps and widgets designed by Marc’s companies have collectively reached hundreds of millions unique visitors online. Marc maintains a blog at twicefunded.com.
